metadata.title: CVE-2017-12871 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The aesEncrypt method in lib/SimpleSAML/Utils/Crypto.php in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.x through 1.14.11 makes it easier for context-dependent attackers to bypass the encryption protection mechanism by leveraging use of the first 16 bytes of the secret key as the initialization vector (IV).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12871` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.14.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
